title: PM2 Monit 100% CPU usage
body:
#### Actual behaviour

... pm2 monit consuming all available resources

#### Steps to reproduce

... `pm2 monit`

#### Software versions used

```
OS         : CentOS / CloudLinux  `3.10.0-427.36.1.lve1.4.40.el7.x86_64 `
node.js    : v7.7.4
PM2        : v2.4.2
```

#### PM2 Log output

Use the command: `tail --lines 50 ~/.pm2/pm2.log`

